summary: An ordinance providing for the appropriation and condemnation of a right of way for a public sewer, through certain lots, blocks, tracts and parcels of land lying between 14th Avenue West and 11th Avenue West, produced between West Ray Street and West Armour Street, all in the City of Seattle and providing for the ascertainment and payment of the just compensation to be made for the private property to be taken or damaged for said purpose.
